verses.verse: In that day <WH3117> you will say, <WH559> "I will give thanks <WH3034> to you, <WH3068> Yahweh; for though you were angry <WH599> with me, <WH639> your anger has turned away <WH7725> and you comfort me. <WH5162>

Behold, <WH410> God is my salvation. <WH3444> I will trust, <WH982> and will not be afraid; <WH6342> for Yah, <WH3050> Yahweh, <WH3050> is my strength <WH5797> and song; <WH2176> and he has become my salvation. <WH3444>"
Therefore with joy <WH8342> you will draw <WH7579> water <WH4325> out of the wells <WH4599> of salvation. <WH3444>

In that day <WH3117> you will say, <WH559> "Give thanks <WH3034> to Yahweh! <WH3068> Call <WH7121> on his name. <WH8034> Declare <WH3045> his doings <WH5949> among the peoples. <WH5971> Proclaim <WH2142> that his name <WH8034> is exalted! <WH7682>
Sing <WH2167> to Yahweh, <WH3068> for he has done <WH6213> excellent things! <WH1348> Let this be known <WH3045> in all the earth! <WH776>
Cry aloud <WH6670> and shout, <WH7442> you inhabitant <WH3427> of Zion; <WH6726> for the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel <WH3478> is great <WH1419> in the midst of you! <WH7130>"
